title: Role-Based Access Control - Dashboard Redirection
description: Verify that authenticated users are redirected to their corresponding dashboards based on their roles (médico, paciente, farmacia, secretaria, clínica).

steps.description: Login with valid credentials for each user role.
Check that the user is redirected to the correct dashboard for their role.

title: Role-Based Access Control - Access Restriction
description: Verify that users cannot access dashboards or routes of roles different than their own.

steps.description: Login as each role and attempt to navigate to a dashboard or protected route of a different role.
Check that access is denied or redirected accordingly.

title: Medical Prescription Creation - Minimum Data Validation
description: Validate that médicos can create and associate a prescription to a patient only when all required fields are correctly filled.

steps.description: Login as médico and navigate to prescription creation page.
Input valid minimal required data for a prescription.
Submit the prescription.
Check that the prescription is successfully created and associated with the selected patient.
Attempt to submit a prescription missing required data.
Check that validation errors are shown and creation is blocked.

title: Patient - Prescription Status Visibility
description: Verify that patients can view the real-time status of their prescriptions on their personal panel.

steps.description: Login as paciente and navigate to their prescriptions panel.
Check that prescriptions and their statuses are displayed correctly and updated in real time.

title: Pharmacy - Prescription Validation and Dispensation
description: Verify that farmacia users can list pending prescriptions, validate them, and update their states upon dispensation.

steps.description: Login as farmacia user and access pending prescriptions list.
Check that all pending prescriptions are listed.
Validate a pending prescription.
Check that the prescription status changes accordingly.
Dispense the prescription and update the status.
Verify that the dispensation reflects in the prescription state and triggers audit events.

title: Secretaria - Administrative Task Management and Coordination
description: Verify that secretaria users can access administrative modules and coordinate operational tasks across roles.

steps.description: Login as secretaria user and access administrative dashboard.
Check available tasks and coordination tools.
Create, update, and delete administrative tasks.
Verify tasks are persisted and visible to related roles.

title: Audit Events Generation on Prescription State Changes
description: Verify that every change of prescription state generates an auditable event that is logged correctly.

steps.description: Perform various prescription state transitions (creation, validation, dispensation).
Verify that each transition generates a correctly structured audit event recorded in the logs.

title: API Performance - Clinical and AI Support Endpoints
description: Ensure that critical API routes for clinical support and AI assistance respond within performance targets (<800ms for queries, <1200ms for mutations).

steps.description: Invoke GET queries on support and AI suggestion endpoints.
Confirm response times are under 800ms.
Invoke POST or mutation endpoints related to these features.
Confirm response times are under 1200ms.

title: Desktop Applications - Offline Mode and Synchronization
description: Verify that médico and farmacia desktop apps work correctly in offline mode and synchronize data reliably when back online.

steps.description: Launch desktop app and switch to offline mode.
Perform typical operations like creating/modifying prescriptions.
Verify local data persistence without errors.
Reconnect to network and trigger synchronization.
Ensure data syncs correctly with backend and status updates propagate.

title: Shared Contracts Integrity Across Web and Desktop
description: Validate the consistency and integrity of shared types and schemas between web and desktop applications to ensure no contract mismatch.

steps.description: Run automated tests and validations on shared type packages.
Confirm type and schema contracts match expected definitions and no breaking changes exist.

title: Code Quality - Linting and Static Analysis Enforcement
description: Ensure that the codebase passes all linting rules with no blocking errors or critical warnings.

steps.description: Run ESLint and static code analyzers on all project packages.
Verify zero linting errors and acceptable warning levels.

title: Testing Coverage - Unit, Integration and E2E Tests
description: Verify that unit, integration and end-to-end tests cover critical use cases without failures.

steps.description: Execute full test suite including unit, integration and e2e tests.
Ensure all tests pass and coverage meets predefined thresholds.

title: Monitoring and Metrics Instrumentation Validation
description: Confirm that key metrics and logs are properly instrumented and dashboards display real-time monitoring data.

steps.description: Trigger various key actions in the system (login, prescription lifecycle events, API calls).
Check that metrics update, logs are generated and monitoring dashboards reflect the activity.
